content.question: Which of the following is an implication of the data in the map?

choices.label: Foreign direct investment in northern Nigeria has led to regional disparity.
Nigeria has the most equal wealth distribution of all African countries.
Oil dependency in Nigeria has contributed to the uneven development of the economy.
Investment in Nigeria is centered in the capital, which has led to national wealth disparities.

content.answer: Oil dependency in Nigeria has contributed to the uneven development of the economy.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
